ingredients: 4 cups arugula, 8  fresh figs, quartered,   +   1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese, 2 tablespoons toasted pine nuts, 2 tablespoons honey, 2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar
nutrition: Total Fat 4g 5%, Saturated Fat 1g 7%, Cholesterol 4mg 1%, Sodium 85mg 4%, Total Carbohydrate 31g 11%, Dietary Fiber 3g 12%, Total Sugars 27g, Protein 4g, Vitamin C 5mg 26%, Calcium 127mg 10%, Iron 1mg 7%, Potassium 349mg 7%
